(Intrinsic Weapon [bonus], Bludgeoning Damage [blunt], Magic weapon [magic])

Requires 5A to forge (A1)

These shoes are still amazingly light despite their iron soles. The shoes will allow their wearer to deliver powerful kicks in addition to his normal attacks.
